VII.i.2.E.10.c
.
Payment Dates for Reinstated DIC
Although, the date of enactment of
PL 105-178
, Section 8207 was June 9, 1998, no payment may be made prior to October 1, 1998.
Therefore, taking into consideration
38 CFR 3.31
and
38 CFR 3.114(a)
, awards for reinstated DIC entitlement
may
be processed with a payment date as early as, but no earlier than, October 1, 1998.
